website_summaries.verdict: A luxurious hydrating body butter that won't leave you with an oily sheen.
pros: 100% pure argan oil nourishes and repairs skin
Rich cream spreads easily and absorbs quickly
Locks in moisture to hydrate skin
cons: No fragrance added, but some don't like the product's natural scent

website_summaries.verdict: Award-winning range of deliciously scented butters from the supermodel's eco line.
pros: Fluffy cream that’s whipped to perfection
Skin is nourished with shea butter, white tea extract, and avocado oil
100% pure argan oil is rich but not greasy
cons: Some find the scents to be overwhelming

customer_reviews.title: FAKE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a tub I bought from Sephora. When I opened this one, there was no seal on the tub, and I could tell right away that the texture was not Josie Maran. The scent is different (even though it's unscented, the real Josie Maran has a light, distinct smell), it doesn't feel the same, and the jar is only half-full. I'll be demanding my money back and will buy this exclusively from Sephora in the future.
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this product because they all say "Immediate and Long Lasting". This so lightweight and non-greasy it absorbs right into my skin and leaves it glowing. I also use a little on my face. I'm a senior with no wrinkles and very good healthy looking skin however this give me the "glow" I've been looking for. A little mascara, blush, and lip gloss and I look great. I've been getting a lot of compliments. I love this body butter and will purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: BDJ

customer_reviews.title: Such whipped perfection
customer_reviews.text: Ordered red rooibos in 8 oz and vanilla in 19 oz... Both are great scents, sealed jars and fresh. Genuine fantastic josie maran. Order from the right source on here and you'll be happy. Reviews wouldn't t let me post the provider name but I'm happy to answer any questions and let you know which I used. Trust me you'll be happy with your purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Pixie8

customer_reviews.title: The smell is horrible.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years now. This by far has a horrible throw up smell when you rub it on your skin... There was also no seal on this when I opened it. I will not be ordering this from Amazon going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Amber T.

customer_reviews.title: Unscented = Awful Scent
customer_reviews.text: I would give this more stars because the consistency of the product is nice, but the unscented does actually have a scent - smells like old cooking oil or some kind of Pam cooking spray. Not pleasant when you’re rubbing it into your skin. UPDATE: I did try this product in another scent, vanilla bean, and loved it. I would give 5 stars for that scent. And the body butter keeps the skin moisturized; because it’s argon oil, a little bit goes a long way so that you don’t end up feeling greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Josie Maran's products are REAL!
customer_reviews.text: Her Argan oil products are superb. I have very dry skin due to menopause, and these products are the only ones I have tried that definitely make a difference. I think I have bought just about everything she offers and this is my favorite product, along with the Argan oil. I use these both together, especially when I escape up to our mountain home which is 7500 feet. You wouldn't believe how dry your skin can get at such altitudes. I always have ordered the unscented products so I cannot comment on scents. I also love her Milk moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Karon E.

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE BEEN USING JOSIE MORAN PRODUCTS FOR YEARS & DIDN'T KNOW I COULD GET THEM RIGHT HERE AT AMAZON. THE SILKY FEEL AND MOISTURIZING TEXTURE OF THIS MARVELOUS WHIPPED BODY BUTTER IS WITH OUT QUESTION THE BEST ON THE MARKET. PRICING AT AMAZON IS BETTER THAN THE PLACE I HAVE ALWAYS PURCHASED IT BEFORE. IT MAKES YOUR SKIN FEEL SO SOFT & NEVER STICKY. JUST MOISTURIZED & FABULOUS! THE VERY BEST! I WILL BE BACK FOR MORE!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy after all
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this cream it did not have a cover seal under the top and was not filled to the top. So when openig the top assuming there was a seal half spilled out. Not a good buy after all. 40. U can buy it a sehopa for the same price, and it is full jar. Know who u r buying from.
customer_reviews.author: DEBORAH JACOBSON

customer_reviews.title: Amazing moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I just love this stuff! I will never use anything else. Perfect moisturizer. Just a small note.... Thank you Amazon for sending it wrapped up and sealed. I will continue buying from you guys as long as things like this are sealed. Makes me feel good knowing that I can put stuff on my skin without having to worry if someone tampered with it. I’m a buyer for life! ❤️
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed when I received my order of this cream. I was shocked to find the jar was not sealed. Another shock came when I found a quarter of the cream was missing! I do not recommend this item and personally I will never order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Brent

customer_reviews.title: Great Moisturizer and Protection Against Rash
customer_reviews.text: A dermotologist could not solve my problem of rash on my chest caused by heat, humidity, and friction. Dry powders made the situation worse. A friend suggested Josie Maran and within a week, the problem had cleared up! HIghligh recommended for general moisturizing and for keeping your skin protected against rashes caused by heat and friction.
customer_reviews.author: Dotty

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like I have ever used before! Real lasting moisturizer with a fresh clean scent. Makes a dramatic difference in how my skin looks and feels. Like no product I have used before
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Dee

customer_reviews.title: Best moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I’ve used a Josie Marian product & I am totally impressed. I purchased 3 different brands of the whipped body lotion & Maran is by far the best. It’s creamy, smells good, moisturizing & lasts a long time on my dry skin. I will definitely purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Lang

customer_reviews.title: Love the lotion-poor packaging & used product
customer_reviews.text: I’m a huge fan of josie Maran. This lotion is so delectable hence my$35 for it. I’mhappy with the product but have a few issues with how it arrived. (1) the box it was in was opened (2) the lotion looks like it was used. It was half gone. Please see picks. I’m not sure if someone used it then retuned it or what but @ $35, the tub should be full not have a huge hollow in the middle. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: jlu_express

customer_reviews.title: body butter
customer_reviews.text: I am a little disappointed . When I opened my jar there was a hole with no product in it.
customer_reviews.author: brenda h.

customer_reviews.title: JM absolutely the best!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product !!! Better than any other whipped body cream! My skin feels healthy hydrated moisturized ! Not greasy at all ! Would love this to be sold on Amazon in larger size! Works on feet to face! Love this unscented choice! #allergies-no headache! Check out history of this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Hadley

customer_reviews.title: Best body cream i ever tried.
customer_reviews.text: My first jar was a present given to me. I am so happy with how it leaves my skin...soft and not greasy. I ordered another jar because I was so pleased with the product. My 85 year old skin is revived!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry skin or dry climate!
customer_reviews.text: I don't remember how I got this product in the first place, but it ended up in my travel bag and I found it to be the best lotion while on snowboarding trips. The mountains are so dry in the winter and this stuff is just the right amount of heavier lotion that I need when in the mountains!
customer_reviews.author: C. Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Smells fabulous
customer_reviews.text: I just started using Josie Mara product and this the second item I purchased. This is a great product. Use sparing as a small amount goes a long way. It has the most wonderful scent. It is a bit expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy ikeuchi

customer_reviews.title: Josie Moran Sweet Citrus...Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I originally got this lotion as a gift from a friend and after using the 1st jar I couldn't wait to get more. Your skin will feel soft even the next day. :)
customer_reviews.author: Babs Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great product but issues with packaging
customer_reviews.text: I love Josie Marian body butter. However, there is no consistency with regards to the seal under the lid. This order did not have the seals. Disconcerting. And, once again, the jar isn’t full. There was a huge hole in the middle of the product. You aren’t getting the full 8 oz! I find these two issues off and on with her product. My only complaint but it’s something that happens frequently. I’ve been a user of her body butter for over three years. Others have complained about these same two issues.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought 6 and gave them as gifts, each of them were 1/4 to 1/3 empty. This is a production issue and I hope they can fix it. Even tho the produce is very nice, I will not purchase again until this is dealt with.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: soft and creamy skin  even the skin on dry flaky old legs
customer_reviews.text: I use this product everywhere,, especially face, neck, chest, hands and arms. Then I looked at my "old" dry flaky legs and used it there and they still have their old spots but the dry flaky look is gone. AND I love it when my grandkids hold my hand, rub my arms and face and say "Grandma your so soft just like a grandma should be". As long as I can afford to buy it I will use it, its wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It moisturizes without being greasy or leaving a film on my skin. It is perfect. I use the unscented body butter everyday and it keeps my skin soft and supple. No more cracked or rough spots on heels or elbows.
customer_reviews.author: Theodora Monegan

customer_reviews.title: Clear skin
customer_reviews.text: Nothing but 5 stars. My wife got me to use this after years of dealing with these annoying rash flare ups on my arms, hands, I knew I was sensitive to something but after using JM Argan Oil, every weird rash disappeared, my skin looks incredible. Been using it for 4 years. Love it changed my life.
customer_reviews.author: matt hannegan

customer_reviews.title: Remained very sticky many hours after application
customer_reviews.text: Odor was mild and non offensive, easy to apply, but extremely sticky after many hours. All clothing stuck! Not as advertised!
customer_reviews.author: curlygran

customer_reviews.title: Won’t purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this from QVC. This product wasn’t even sealed. I was really disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Super moisturizing!
customer_reviews.text: I live in a dry( well, until this year) climate which is listened as semi arid. This stuff is wonderful. No more scales and bad looking skin......try it! Just don't get the white gold radiance .....you'll look like Goldfinger's handmaidens.
customer_reviews.author: Brad4d

customer_reviews.title: Fake product
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sure this is a knock off. Was not sealed in any way. Goes on greasy and doesn't seem to absorb as I remember when I first ordered it off her site a few years ago. I'll order another jar from her site and compare.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a few years and have found it to be the best skin moisturizer around. A little goes a long way. It melts right into my skin relieving dryness instantly and lasts for several days. The scents are nice and not overpowering. This is definitely my go-to moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: SLH

customer_reviews.title: I love Josie Marian Whipped Arian Oil
customer_reviews.text: I have used Josie whipped Arian Oil for over a year and love how it makes my skin self with not any allergic reaction. It is the best product I’ve ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: desert proof
customer_reviews.text: After a day in the California desert, my hands and feet were like coarse sandpaper. Truly enough to scare of small children and lovers. A little dab is all it takes. Two dabs and your set for the next day.
customer_reviews.author: SDSara.

customer_reviews.title: Use for face moisturizer ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Best stuff on earth! Use it on my face mostly, but have used it all over my body. Since it only takes a small amount, it lasts quite awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Holli Hadlock

customer_reviews.title: Nice thick moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good moisturizer and is thick. The only downfall is that it does feel greasy and sticky after putting it on.
customer_reviews.author: T Rakis

customer_reviews.title: Not greasy! Perfect cream!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve spent a lot of money on different creams and although this one sounds pricey, it’s perfect! Getting ready to gift a few to my friends next since I love it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Fab u lous!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the consistency of this product...and you will too. I use it twice a day and it is the best hydrating product I have ever used. I also put it on the ends of my hair and it keeps my hair hydrated with no frizzy ends. I gave this product to all of the female members of my family (9), and they absolutely love it. Thank you, Josie Maran, for giving us this wonderful product. I look forward to many more purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Emerson

customer_reviews.title: Soooo Soft
customer_reviews.text: Feels fantastic on your skin. I love it so much I'm ordering some as gifts for my friends. Donna
customer_reviews.author: Donna Giacchetti

customer_reviews.title: Gets rid of wrinkles...
customer_reviews.text: Have been using Josie Moran whipped Argon oil moisturizer for years. It's gotten rid of wrinkles around my eyes, and my skin gets so soft from this product. I love it...😘💙
customer_reviews.author: stephen rutsky

customer_reviews.title: Love this. Great for winter dry skin.
customer_reviews.text: Cannot go wrong with Josie Maran products. This is very moisturizing without being greasy. I got the unscented version and was pleased. I have used her scented versions also and love them both. The product was in great condition when I received it. I would repurchase with no hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Karen V

customer_reviews.title: Best Bang for your Buck
customer_reviews.text: Josie’s butter is the best way to keep your feet soft and free of callouses. I swear by it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Campbell-Lui

customer_reviews.title: Product great seller not so great...
customer_reviews.text: Love this product but I had to return....The container was half empty when I received it....
customer_reviews.author: Eco gal....

customer_reviews.title: Best moisturizer ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this moisturizer. I highly recommend this product. Best moisturizer ever!
customer_reviews.author: Arlene L Miller

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful body cream.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using the unscented body butter for years. I’ve tried other cream and lotions but keep coming back to Josie Marian’s body butter. It’s the best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money! Smells fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Cures most dry skin problems. My friend had such dry, cracked skin on his feet, toes, heels. One treatment he had his problems 100 percent improved.
customer_reviews.author: Glo

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Nice and easy to put on. I like to dip into the jar instead of squeezing a tube.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Rosner

customer_reviews.title: Over rated product
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money I paid for this product, disappointed. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: best moisturizer on the market
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this whipped body butter for years. I have tried so many other options to try to save money but nothing compares. It makes your skin look and feel amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unscented
customer_reviews.text: I love that this body butter is unscented and make my skin look and feel better.
customer_reviews.author: barelybreathin

customer_reviews.title: How Easy it is to put on.
customer_reviews.text: I loved, loved, loved the moisturizer, the scent and the softness. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Torres

customer_reviews.title: It makes your skin feel supple
customer_reviews.text: I Love this product it is so silky smooth and has a great fragrance makes my skin feel clean and soft I can’t be without it. I love the fact that you can choose your fragrance or use no fragrance at all. Thanks for providing this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Very moisturizing! No scent which is good. Keeps skin nice all day.
customer_reviews.author: Carol M.

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product!!! LOVE the scent - vanilla bean is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Sullymom

customer_reviews.title: Lovely scent and fantastic moisturizing!
customer_reviews.text: This is a lightly scented body moisturizer. It does a great job softening my skin and the smell is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Christie Yeager

customer_reviews.title: This really is like butter!
customer_reviews.text: I prefer the unscented version of this body butter... It does not interfere with perfume and feels great. The citrus scent I bought smells like grapefruit, which I do not care for, so I won't buy it again. You can't go wrong with the unscented.
customer_reviews.author: r.d. young/ R D Young Cruser

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. Has the most heavenly consistency and fragrance. Too pricey to use every day, though.
customer_reviews.author: Aniela Erkman

customer_reviews.title: Great scent
customer_reviews.text: Love this product.. Its a little spendy.. but it just feels amazing
customer_reviews.author: Tj in Las Vegas

customer_reviews.title: Use a small amount. Use it daily
customer_reviews.text: I use the product on my arms, chest and areas where the skin has thinned and showed signs of crepe. It moisturizes very well and has reduced the crepey skin significantly.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie Kazemaini

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my skin soft & moisturized even with daily showers in hard water!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: The jar I received was not sealed and smelled rancid.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Ranger

customer_reviews.title: great skin in a jar
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the scent!! Softens the driest skin! Just wish it was not so expensive.
customer_reviews.author: SBz

customer_reviews.title: Received fake item
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and this one I received is a total fake No scent and thicker then usual the usual glow you have after using it is not there instead I feel a little bit sandy Don’t buy it from this vendor
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Eisele

customer_reviews.title: fake fake fake
customer_reviews.text: I have used this before I bought it from Sephora no way this is real the smell is extremely strong Gave me a rash will never buy from Amazon again
customer_reviews.author: susan c

customer_reviews.title: Thick Moisturizer Mild Long Lasting Scent
customer_reviews.text: This is thee best moisturizer on the market in my opinion. Its a little thick so you need to really work it in the skin by rubbing.
customer_reviews.author: Alan the Engineer

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It leaves your skin so soft & the perfume is a very mild scent. I have been using it for several years. A little bit goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: BEST moisturizer for summer
customer_reviews.text: I, for one love to be out and about in the summer months. Even with sunscreen the skin tends to be dry with all that outdoor play!! This is an essential for me during the summer months!
customer_reviews.author: Terrie Lynema

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer?
customer_reviews.text: I haven't found anything I don't like with this moisturizer. My skin is soft, hydrated, and no greasy feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The consistency is too thick unlike the amazing Bodyshop Coconut Milk Body Lotion, and the smell isn't very pleasant. Given the high cost, very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really great cream. To enhance the softness of my hands ...
customer_reviews.text: Really great cream. To enhance the softness of my hands I first use a little bit of Egyptian Magic. The softest hands ever and NOT greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia M.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't get what I ordered. Disappointed. Won't order again.
customer_reviews.text: The jar had a big empty spot in it. Looks like air was blown in it before sealing it so I didn't get a jar full of creme. Very disappointed in the prduct.
customer_reviews.author: Wilma Smith

customer_reviews.title: soothing, feels so wonderful
customer_reviews.text: my favorite lotion, moisturizing and soothing after being in the sun and skin is dry
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Love this Argan oil
customer_reviews.text: This Argan oil is awesomely smooth and leaves your skin hydrated and shiny
customer_reviews.author: lisbeth R.

customer_reviews.title: What's the Big Deal
customer_reviews.text: I did not find this product to be worth the price. My skin did not feel moisturized, soft or look any different. I would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Arrington

customer_reviews.title: I can't live without this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Josie Maran's body butter for years and never allow myself to run out. It is a game changer for your skin and no other product that I've tried has the same beauty benefits. Try it... you won't regret your purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JAMIE LEMON

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff - wish I didn't but I do
customer_reviews.text: I was given a jar for Christmas. I love how it feels. I love that it really is unscented. I do not like the price - I can't believe that I am paying this much for a jar that last 4-5 weeks. But I keep doing it - truly a self care indulgence.
customer_reviews.author: Janet A.

customer_reviews.title: LIGHT WEIGHT, FEELS NOURISHING AND GREAT MOISTURE!
customer_reviews.text: LOVED THIS WHIPPED, LIGHTWEIGHT PRODUCT. NOT GREASY AT ALL AND ABSORBS BEAUTIFULLY. I WILL BUY AGAIN!!! I HAVE BEEN USING THE FACIAL WHIPPED BUTTER AND I LOVE THAT SO I THOUGHT I WOULD TRY THIS TOO. I LOVE THEM BOTH!
customer_reviews.author: ANNE NARIE SHERIDAN

customer_reviews.title: The BEST lotion!!
customer_reviews.text: I am completely hooked on this lotion! I got it from a recommendation by a Sephora saleswoman, and she didn’t steer me wrong! It has absolutely saved my hands during all of the recent increase In hand-washing and Sanitizing,
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Boden

customer_reviews.title: Great Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is FANTASTIC!! Best moisturizer for my body ever. Great for dry hands. Put it on before bed, it’s wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Light and Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Got a 2oz sample for Christmas and it lasted me till March with regular usage. This stuff is amazing! Light on your skin and doesn't clog any pores. Scent is fresh and not overpowering at all. My skin is very sensitive but this really passed the test! <3 Josie Maran
customer_reviews.author: Legs

customer_reviews.title: It’s important to know that this product works
customer_reviews.text: I have used Josie Maran’s products for many years. The Body Butter is one of my favorites. I recently discovered how to keep my hands looking smooth by messaging them with the Body Butter
customer_reviews.author: Gloria W.

customer_reviews.title: Work very well
customer_reviews.text: Yes this is the best product I ever ordered so far , for my dry skin and that has work . Very expensive but worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Josie Maran whipped argon oil butter!
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day right after my shower and it is the best moisturizer I have ever used. I also use Josie Maran argon oil whipped face butter. I have sensitive skin so I get the unscented. Hopefully they will never change it in any way.
customer_reviews.author: Lois J.

customer_reviews.title: Great company
customer_reviews.text: Always like this product. Consistently good. It lasts..a little goes a long way
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a very luxurious cream that lasts on your skin, making it softer and more moist.
customer_reviews.text: I love this body cream. It really helps with dry winter skin. I do not like it's price but have ordered it several times. I tell myself that I am worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love! Love! Love!
customer_reviews.text: Nice soft glow and moisturizing. My skin is so soft and not sticky or greasy/oily. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: Skye

customer_reviews.title: the best!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! Very hydrating with a nice soft fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Tyson

customer_reviews.title: Skin salvager!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. Josie makes fantastic, quality Argan products!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An excellent moisturizer.
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this product before, and like how smoothly it goes on my face. I apply a drop of the argan oil, and combined; my face feels even more moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Citrus is the best, apricot is not so much!
customer_reviews.text: At first, I thought that the product was fake because it doesn't smell sweet and fruity what you would expect from apricot and vanilla. But the seller did sell the original product.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I truly love this stuff!! I use it on my face and it leaves it moisturized yet not greasy!
customer_reviews.author: CBay

customer_reviews.title: Amazon has the best prices than most companies
customer_reviews.text: Josie Maran is the absolute best in skin care products. Her products make your skin feel so soft
customer_reviews.author: Pearl C.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I am 100% obsessed with this stuff! And the smell is absolutely amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Great hydration!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! My skin stays hydrated and soft all day!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The product is as described and as expected. I have repurchased this product.
customer_reviews.author: Acct Exec

customer_reviews.title: Best body butter
customer_reviews.text: Love this body butter, super hydrating & leaves the skin with a nice hue. Improves dry skin & look of wrinkles too
customer_reviews.author: PattyGP

customer_reviews.title: The perfect cream
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand. It makes my skin so soft and adds a glow to the skin. I’ve tried other brands that have Aragon oil, but Josie’s is the best. It’s worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Pat strauss

customer_reviews.title: Sexy summer legs!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best moisturizing lotion for that exposed skin and summer look. It can be a bit tacky so I wouldn’t put clothes over it and definitely apply it last. Extends summer tan!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: For me this is the best moisturizing cream there is. I’ve had it before and it was invented. This one is vanilla and it’s wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product. Goes on evenly and smooth
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. Goes on evenly and smooth. You don't need a lot of this body balm as you would with other lotions. A little goes a long way. even after one application, lasts ALL day! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: This is great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! It absorbs into the skin do well It keeps my skin soft and smooth! It is a bit pricey, but worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It is so smooth and silky. This is the first time I bought no scent and I kind of miss my the nice smelling lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Josie Maran Whipped Argan Oil Body Butter - Immediate, Lightweight, and Long-Lasting Nourishment to Soften and Hydrate Skin (240ml/8.0oz, Unscented)
product_meta.description: Size:8 Ounce| Color:UnscentedJosie Maran Whipped Argan Oil Ultra Hydrating Body Butter in Unscented - 8 oz (240 ml)
feature_bullets: 100% Pure Argan Oil whipped to buttery perfection revitalizes skin, restores softness, and improves skin’s texture.

This ultra-hydrating body butter enriches skin with essential fatty acids and antioxidants to soften, smooth, and firm skin. The lightweight, velvety texture absorbs instantly for immediate and long-lasting nourishment.
Use anywhere on the body to soften and maintain well-hydrated skin. For best results, use after bathing when pores are open and receptive to whipped, velvety goodness.

Josie Maran believes in cosmetics with a conscience. That is why Whipped Argan Oil is cruelty free, vegan, paraben free, sulfate free, gluten free, phthalate free, synthetic fragrance free, mineral oil free, formaldehyde free, and peg free.
Whipped Argan Oil Body Butter contains shea butter, avocado oil, white tea extract, and essential nutrients to create a lightweight, velvety texture that absorbs instantly.
